Dirty Appetizer dishes were finally removed by a manager well after our dinner had arrived.  I think they must have been out of mustard because after numerous requests to various employees including the dish removing manager, we decided to just eat before our burgers got as cold as our fries.  Drink refills, including the alcoholic ones were nonexistent.  Unless you were my husband who must have bonded with "big D" in another life.  He had 3 or 4 Refills.  He loves his coke and was giddy with excitement..  Worst service we have had in a very long time.    Will we return?  We thinks... NOT,
LOVE THIS PLACE.  They have the best french fries anywhere[.  Also do great appetizers and of course their burgers are beyond compare!

The burgers were ok consider that they were almost $10 each. Service is horrible! Our waitress never come to refill our water. she brought our check before we ordered our dessert, so we had to ask her adjust the check. It took her forever to get an extra plate. She just made everything very difficult for us.

Although the food is decent, I must say the staff seems miserable and while we were there we could absolutely understand why! We went on a busy Saturday night, our waitress was extremely overwhelmed with too many tables and not enough help. The manager Dave stood in the middle of the dining room yelling and critiquing her, not helping one bit. We could see she was visibly upset and was trying hard to maintain her composure. The manager was barking orders and seemed the type who didn't want to get his hands or suit dirty. I have already called corporate. He was abusive! If I had a daughter I would NOT want her working for that man. The restaurant could have been cleaner also, will not be back to that location.

Service kinda sucked. For a Tuesday night and barely anyone in the restaurant you would think service would be spot on, plus our server was training a new girl. You think she would show the trainee how to serve a table. Took us a good 7 minutes to  be greeted.  But other than that the food was hot and fresh.

I generally wouldn't think about reviewing a chain restaurant particularly since this was the first time I'd eaten here.  But I was here yesterday and found the service to be really, really good!  I enjoyed the strawberry vojito ( mojito made with vodka). I asked for extra strawberries and I got 'em!  And the vojito was absolutely excellent...and I know a good mojito when I taste it.  Any how, I liked the fat fries starter; that was a nice change of pace from bread baskets.  I bet we'll see more restaurants copying that change.  Hint, mix the potato fries with sweet potato fries!  Anyway, I ate the lettuce wrapped burger and salad.  To quote Samuel L. Jackson in Pulp Fiction, "that was one tasty burger!". But for the calories, I would have ordered an extra patty.  I'm thinking my server was telling the truth about Red Robin beating In 'n Out in the Zagat review of burgers because  I thought RR's burger was really good; and i like In 'n Out's protein style burger.  Anyway, I'm still going to check that Zagat comment out though. My date had the cod fish and chips.  He thought they were pretty good even though he really wanted the salmon instead.  Apparently RR  stopped making the fish and chips with salmon but it still showed on the menu. The assistant manager came out, explained and apologized.  Nice service touch. The server was really friendly and he checked in often.  He surprised my date and me when he said the burger was on the house because it took a bit longer than usual to get it to the table.  Although i hadn't noticed the delay (the sign of a good date), it was nevertheless a nice thing to do. All in all, the restaurant a nice ambiance for a pre-movie, late lunch date.  For me, the folks at RR made a good first impression.  I'd stop in again and plan to as well.

My mom and I wanted a quick dinner after we got in to palm desert. This was a good option...they have a large menu, the staff was nice and the food was good. I do have to say their alcoholic drinks were REALLY weak so that was a bummer!!
